code: import*as React from"react";import{Box,Heading,Text,Button,Link}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{Icon}from'@chakra-ui/react';import{FaGithub}from"react-icons/all";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Description=function Description(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{className:"description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{as:"h3",size:"lg",textAlign:"center",paddingBottom:"1em",children:"Hi, I am Hana \uD83D\uDC4B"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{marginLeft:"1em",marginRight:"1em",children:["\uD83C\uDF93 I am a penultimate year student at Yale-NUS.",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"\uD83D\uDCBB I am looking for more opportunities in Software Engineering."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{href:"https://github.com/raihanahnabilah/",isExternal:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{marginTop:"1.5em",gap:"0.5em",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{as:FaGithub,w:8,h:8})," View my GitHub"]})})]});};export default Description;
